query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.
10 Così Beatrice; e quelle anime liete 11 si fero spere sopra fissi poli, 12 fiammando, a volte, a guisa di comete.
query.error: **English:** 10 Thus Beatrice; and those joyful souls 11 made themselves spheres above fixed poles, 12 flaming, at times, like comets.
query.result: 10 Þus cwæð Beatrice; and ða bliðe gasta 11 worhton him sferas ofer fæste polas, 12 byrnende, hwilum, on gelicnesse cometa.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.

query.result: 16 swa ða carolas, ðaniende mislice, 17 ðurh heora sped and ðurh heora unsped, 18 me dydon ðæt ic heora sped gestealde.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.
19 Di quella ch’io notai di più carezza 20 vid’ ïo uscire un foco sì felice, 21 che nullo vi lasciò di più chiarezza;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.
22 e tre fïate intorno di Beatrice 23 si volse con un canto tanto divo, 24 che la mia fantasia nol mi ridice.
query.error: **English:** 22 and three times around Beatrice 23 it turned with a song so divine, 24 that my imagination cannot recall it to me.
query.result: 22 and ðrywa geond ða Beatrican 23 hit gewende mid ðam songe swa heofonlicum, 24 ðæt min mod ðæt ne mæg areccan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.
25 Però salta la penna e non lo scrivo: 26 ché l’imagine nostra a cotai pieghe, 27 non che ’l parlare, è troppo color vivo.
query.error: **English:** 25 Therefore my pen leaps and I do not write it: 26 for our imagination at such junctures, 27 not to mention speech, is too vivid a color.
query.result: 25 Forðæm hlyppeð min pen and ic hit ne write: 26 forðæm ðe ure myneweard on swylcum bigongum, 27 nis ðæt ðæt spræc, is to cwicol hiw.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.

query.result: 28 "Eala, min halga sweostor ðe swa us gebidst, 29 geornful, ðurh ðinne glædmodan lust, 30 fram ðære fægran lyfte me alyse."
